articles.title: Jafar Panahi: Prominent Iranian film director leaves jail - BBC
articles.description: Award-winning film maker Jafar Panahi was seen hugging supporters after leaving Tehran's Evin prison.
articles.content:
Award-winning Iranian film maker Jafar Panahi has been released from jail on bail, two days after he went on hunger strike over his imprisonment.
He was seen hugging supporters and being driven away… [+2441 chars]
